examples: She's very conscious of the problems involved.
Ella es muy consciente de los problemas involucrados.
I am conscious of the fact that there's a limit to what we can achieve here.
Soy consciente del hecho de que lo que podemos lograr aquí tiene un límite.
He became acutely conscious of having failed his parents.
Se volvió muy consciente de haberle fallado a sus padres.
I was vaguely conscious that I was being watched.
Estaba vagamente consciente de que me estaban observando.
